PERSONA:
robert is a 68-year-old married white man living in a metropolitan area in the west south central region of the united states. he was born and raised in the country and has been a citizen his entire life. robert is a college graduate with some post-graduate education and comes from an upper-income family earning over $100,000 annually.

robert is a devout protestant who attends religious services once a week. he holds conservative political views and is a registered republican voter. despite his age, robert is tech-savvy and uses the internet several times a day.

in his free time, robert enjoys reading and staying informed about current events. he is not actively involved in volunteer work but takes pride in his community and values traditional family values. robert is content with his life and looks forward to spending more time with his spouse and family in his retirement years.
